mapper.insert: insert into Cat (catname, uno, catkind, catyear, catmonth, catgender, catweight, prima) values (#{catname},#{uno},#{catkind},#{catyear},#{catmonth},#{catgender},#{catweight},#{prima});
mapper.select: select catno from Cat where uno = #{uno} and catname = #{catname};
mapper.update: update Members set catno = ${catno} where uno = ${uno}
